thread.title: Louisiana Weather Outlook: Christmas Day Temperatures 10-15 Degrees Above Normal - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Louisiana Weather Outlook: Christmas Day Temperatures 10-15 Degrees Above Normal - NewsBreak

author: County Herald Weather Center
title: Louisiana Weather Outlook: Christmas Day Temperatures 10-15 Degrees Above Normal - NewsBreak
text:
By County Herald Weather Center ,
4 hours ago Country Herald is Local News, Independent Pulse. Covering breaking local news, sports, lifestyle and events. An unseasonably warm weather pattern is expected to continue across southwest Louisiana and southeast Texas as the region approaches Christmas, according to the National Weather Service in Lake Charles. Forecast models show strong upper-level ridging becoming established over the southern United States, allowing temperatures to remain well above normal through the holiday period.
